attributes.action: A mortortorium on all developments in the Hoo Peninsula, Cliffe and Cliffe Woods
attributes.additional_details: The local authority is blaming the government targets for new homes in Medway and is destroying our countryside and our way of life. The local authority is also ignoring petition not raised through this system
attributes.background: Stop all developments on Green and farm land, and improve the existing infrastructure ie roads, schools, sewage, transport and increase capacity before more homes are built

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Medway Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

Further, the Government's Housing Infrastructure Fund was specifically created to support the building of the infrastructure needed to support the building of new houses, potentially including roads, sewage and more: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/625528/DCLG_Introduction_to_Housing_Infrastructure_WEB.pdf. It is therefore not clear what else you want the UK Government to do. 

You could start a petition calling for the Government to ban any development on green belt land if that is something you'd like to happen.
